conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to a clean 3D isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear thickness, height, and depth.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the floor plan; all rooms, adjacency, and partitions are accurately reflected. Windows/Doors align despite slight wall thickness offset.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches intended room functions (beds, sofas, kitchen fixtures); bathroom fixtures present.

visual_clarity.notes: The 3D image contains original 2D text labels (Bath, WC, WM, ROBE, Garage) which slightly cluttered the presentation, but clarity remains high.

detected_errors.description: Original 2D text labels remained on the floor plane in the 3D render.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that preserves every structural and functional detail of the original floor plan.
